alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 6:13PM MDT until August 12 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The Parleys Burn Scar in... Northeastern Salt Lake County in northern Utah... * Until 815 PM MDT. * At 613 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Parleys Burn Scar. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Excessive rainfall over the burn scar will result in debris flow moving through the Parleys Burn Scar and to I-80 where impacts to eastbound lanes between mile marker 136-137 are expected. The debris flow can consist of rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Parleys Burn Scar. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Parleys Burn Scar. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Eastbound lanes of Interstate 80 between mile markers 136-137 within Parleys Canyon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
